WintercampWhyByJames

The influences of:--

  • Technological developments
  • Environmental challenges
  • --A crisis of confidence in intellectual property--
  • Social change

Increasing recognition of the potential of communities and networks

  • --Intellectual property frameworks must be transformed to be appropriate in a networked age--

An extraordinary time of crisis and opportunity Bricolabs is concerned to engage with these challenges and...

Delighted to support the Bricolabs network because...

  • Bricolabs shares our vision that ICTs present both a danger to and a valuable opportunity to create more healthy societies.
  • Gain skills, support and insights.
  • Explore and research new networked technologies.
  • Critically evaluate new ICT infrastructures and systems.

Learning lessons

Shared approaches to ICT for creating and sustaining more just, democratic, open and creative societies, in situations of post-industrial crisis and in developing countries.
